channel.title: [PI] Training Bow Fix [PI] *[FIXED] View to see how!
channel.description:
So, the item id = 9705, [b]Training Bow[/b], i added in combat assistant only it can use the Training Bow, but the problem is that, it gives me attack, str, def exp, instead of the Range exp or Range-Defence Exp. So what file do i go so it can be exactly like the others bows, giving range exp?
Media: The interface for the Training Bow [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2zq6ems.jpg[/img]
*[FIXED] Just add it on [b]itemassistant.java[/b] and add it on [b]public final int[] BOWS[/b] in the [b]player.java[/b] file, make sure to add the arrows.
Training Bow: id= 9705 Training Arrows: id= 9706

item.title: [PI] Training Bow Fix [PI] *[FIXED] View to see how!
item.dc:creator: @Driman_Rune Driman Rune
item.description:
@Driman_Rune wrote:

Yeah i am doing that now, i am currently putting all the Training Arrow wherever i see 882: Bronze Arrow.
But i just made it to a 2h weapon, since you could wield a shield.

But i still need help with making it give range exp, instead of combat, i looked all over and i put it on where item: 841; shortbow is,â€¦

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Training Bow Fix [PI] *[FIXED] View to see how!
item.dc:creator: @God_Pure1 God_Pure
item.description:
@God_Pure1 wrote:

If I were you, I would search for ids of other bows and add it into those places, bows without special attack. It probably just has to be defined as a bow.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Training Bow Fix [PI] *[FIXED] View to see how!
item.dc:creator: @Driman_Rune Driman Rune
item.description:
@Driman_Rune wrote:

So, the item id = 9705, Training Bow, i added in combat assistant only it can use the Training Bow, but the problem is that, it gives me attack, str, def exp, instead of the Range exp or Range-Defence Exp. So what file do i go so it can be exactly like the others bows, giving range exp?

Media:
The interface for the Training Bow

*[FIXED]
Just add it on itemassistant.java and add it on public final int[] BOWS in the player.java file, make sure to add the arrows.

Training Bow: id= 9705
Training Arrows: id= 9706
